job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Senior Front-End Engineer for our Personalization and Recommendations team.

   The Personalization and Recommendations has the mission to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content. We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.

   What you'll do

   Your role in the team is to develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search. The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier. It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Front-End Engineer

We are looking for a Senior Front-End Engineer for our Personalization and Recommendations team.

   The Personalization and Recommendations has the mission to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content. We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.

   What you'll do

   Your role in the team is to develop the frontend of a completely new product: Conversational Search. The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier. It leverages technologies like generative AI and Large Language Models (LLMs). Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end development for a conversational search product that *uses* generative AI. However, it lacks details on building, fine-tuning, or deploying the AI models themselves, which are core to GenAI or ML Engineer roles. The primary focus remains on user interface and user experience development.

job_tasks.phrase: develop the frontend of a completely new product
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the core responsibility of building the user interface and client-side logic of an application, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: The product is meant to help our users find the goods on our websites easier
job_tasks.justification: This describes the user-facing goal and functionality of the software being developed, aligning with the purpose of front-end software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Having an all-knowing assistant at your disposal can change the way our users interact with our websites completely.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the impact and user interaction aspect of the software being built, which is a key concern for front-end engineers.

job_tasks.phrase: Our Personalization and Recommendations has the mission to allow our marketplaces to improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content.
job_tasks.justification: This statement outlines the business objective and strategic goal of the team, which the front-end development will support.

job_tasks.phrase: We build search and discovery solutions, we have recommender systems and user modelling products and are currently building a conversational search solution.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the team's existing products and the new initiative, providing business context for the role.

soft_skills.skill: improve the buying experience by understanding our users and surfacing inspirational content
